price: ߒߠߋ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߕߴߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߣߌ߫ ߞߘߐߓߐߞߏ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߘߊ߰ߡߎ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߓߍ߫ ߛߊߣߌ߬ ߥߊ߯ߕߌ߫ ߕߍ߫
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-in adrī laʿallahu fit'natun lakum wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
